content:
tschneidereit commented on issue #7261:

I'll ensure that both copies of the wit files are in sync once I've worked through any feedback

pchickey commented on issue #7261:

This is much easier to accept than #7260 which I think we want to see a tested implementation for in order to land. b663ccf, on the other hand, is trivial. Can you rebase this PR to be just that commit?

pchickey edited a comment on issue #7261:

This is much easier to accept than #7260 which I think we want to see a tested implementation for in order to land. b663ccf, on the other hand, is trivial. Can you rebase this PR to be just that commit, and provide an implementation?

pchickey commented on issue #7261:

I sent this upstream as https://github.com/WebAssembly/wasi-http/pull/65, I'll work on an implementation in another PR

elliottt commented on issue #7261:

I think this is redundant with main now, as we've implemented the upstreamed mutators. Do you mind if we close this PR @tschneidereit ?

alexcrichton commented on issue #7261:

I'm going to close this due to @elliottt's prior comment and the main changes having been incorporated.
